name: LowRezJamUntitled
description:
----------------CONTROLS----------------

-MOVE -> W A S D-

-AIM -> Mouse-

-SHOOT -> LMB-

-DASH -> MOVE + RMB-

-RELOAD -> R-

-PLACE BOMB -> SpaceBar-

-INTERACT -> E-

-------------------------------------------

This is an early version of the game. Currently there are:

-Three levels

-Random level generation

-Six items

-Four enemies

- Working bombs

-Locked doors and keys

-Shop

-Enemy loot

-Player movement is considered final (might change through feedback)

To be added:

-More enemies

-Random Bosses

-More items

-More levels

-Static bosses (always on the same level)

-Final boss
